alert.note: Alert for Iberia; St. Landry; St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 8:18PM CDT until June 20 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Iberia Parish in south central Louisiana... Northwestern St. Martin Parish in south central Louisiana... Southeastern St. Landry Parish in central Louisiana... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 817 PM CDT, a band of severe thunderstorms were located from Atchafalaya National Wildlife Refuge, or 10 miles south of Krotz Springs, to Butte La Rose moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Catahoula, Breaux Bridge, St. Martinville, Krotz Springs, Leonville, Arnaudville, Melville, Port Barre, Henderson, Butte La Rose, Cecilia, Atchafalaya National Wildlife Refuge, Atchafalaya Welcome Center and Parks. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 110 and 126. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
